title: How to share audible books - Quora

response.answer_text: Send This BookThrough the “Send this Book” function you can send the audiobooks in your library to friends and family. If it’s your recipient's first time accepting an audiobook through this function, it will be free, with those already having an account needing to purchase the book. Amazon Household SharingIf the recipient is an immediate family member or close friend you can use "Amazon Household Sharing" which lets you share your Audiobooks with up to 2 adults and 4 children.

I have written this answer as a direct reply—however—i decided to add it here—so others can benefit from it. “ It’s fairly easy for you to share Audible books. On my research—I’ve found 3 prominent ways to share audible books with friends—and family. Using an Audible converter (premium tool)Using the family digital content sharing of ‘Amazon Household’ (free with limitation—possible to with only one adult)Using the ‘Send It’ functionality of the audible App—and Audible on the Web.You can learn read a step-by-step guide on how how to do the 3 methods All the 3 options are easy to execute. And the premium audible converter—has its 30-days free trial—thus you could share unlimited-ly till you decide to purchase it or not. It removed the DRM and converts to MP3—for easy sharing I hope this answer helps in a tangible way.Cheers. “
